title: gdbinit file
extract: ~/.gdbinit User initialization file. It is executed unless user specified GDB options "-nx", "-n" or "-nh". ./.gdbinit Initialization file for current directory. It may need to be enabled with GDB security command "set auto-load local-gdbinit".
extract_html: ~/.gdbinit User initialization file. It is executed unless user specified GDB options "-nx", "-n" or "-nh". ./.gdbinit Initialization file for current directory. It may need to be enabled with GDB security command "set auto-load local-gdbinit".
